ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think it should cost more to make it than to buy it from a vendor, though -- with the new increases, isn t that what it s gong to work out to? ...
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think it should cost more to make it than to buy it from a vendor,
though -- with the new increases, isn't that what it's gong to work out to?


----- Original Message -----
From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 1:27 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Pottery


> From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
>

these

now
